name: Food's Mania
description:
Context and presentation :

Obesity has been a social problem in Réunion for years. Indeed, according to the figures more than one out of two people is obese or overweight. It is within this context that this serious game project based on nutrition aims to sensitize young people on the notion of balanced eating in a fun and playful way.

Inputs :

  • Movement : Z(Jump), Q(Go left), S(Crouch), D(Go right)
  • Shoot : Left-click
